description:
Welcome to Kindle Publishing Success. The easiest way to earn a 6-figure passive income in years to come.

The goal of this course is to provide you the the step-by-step in getting started as a self-publishing author or Freelancer Book Publisher.

Not an author? No worries! This course will show you how you can outsource an excellent writer dirt-cheap!

Learn and Master the best and easiest way to publish books in Amazon and how to promote your books

  • How to find Profitable niches
  • Why do you need to stick to one niche
  • How to promote your books to various Social Media
  • How to create best compelling title for your book
  • How to Outsource covers to your books
  • How to format your Kindle books
Master the basic and advance Techniques in Building your Kindle Business
  • How to create a Title that will get readers attention
  • How to create books that provides value to your readers
  • How to build list out of your books
  • How to create an opt-in page for your book
  • How to generate tons of downloads
  • Technique in using the Kindle Select and how to maximize it

Contents and Overview

This course is for serious Entrepreneurs, writers and publisher who want to make use of Amazon market. The strategies that has been mentioned is based on the experience of the course maker. More video updates is being published to keep this course up-to-date.
title: Kindle Publishing Success: Easy 6-figure Passive Income
